newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia to close Oct. coffee registrations.
newsitem.headline: Colombia to close Oct. coffee registrations.

text.p: Colombia will close October coffee registrations for private exporters as of Monday, Oct. 21, a statement from the National Coffee Growers Federation said.
October registrations for Federation exporters were already closed on Sept. 30.
The statement said registrations for December shipments by Federation and private exporters would be opened on Oct. 21.
Private exporters will be authorized to ship a total of 270,000 70-kilo bags in December, the statement said.
